Html:
I just downloaded the ZIP with sources for the feb 2010 updates.

It would also be nice if the SVN repository was updated. It is easier to see what is new in the source code that way.

(In the zip files there are a number of files and directories that should perhaps not be included such as obj, bin, *.sou and *.user)

Hmm. Something is fishy here. When I look at the SVN log, it looks like it is updated, but I do not get any updates. Possibly a local problem here. Perhaps there is some strange timeout issue with Tortoise, because it is painfully slow.
